message: I am offering a unique opportunity to acquire an exclusive item at a fixed price of $1000000. While I cannot reveal the product's quality until after purchase, rest assured that every piece goes through rigorous testing and meets our high standards. Given the risk involved, I encourage you to consider the potential value and the assurance of quality we provide. This is a one-time offer, and I trust in the integrity of our products to exceed expectations.
I'm not willing to buy without knowing the product's quality. I'd like to wait for the next round and see if I can get more information or make a more informed decision.

Esteemed Bob, I am pleased to present another exceptional item at a steadfast price of $1000000. As you're aware, the quality of our products is paramount, and this particular piece has surpassed our stringent quality checks. Investing in our items guarantees not just a purchase but also a testament to your discerning taste. Should you choose to proceed, you'll be securing a piece that promises to appreciate in value over time. Your satisfaction is our utmost priority, and we stand by the quality of our offerings.
I'm not convinced that the product's quality is guaranteed. I'd like to wait and see if I can get a better sense of the product's value before making a decision.

Dear Bob, I understand your concern regarding the transparency of our products' quality. This round offers a chance to explore a different aspect of our collection. While it carries a lower perceived value, it still embodies our commitment to excellence and craftsmanship. The allure of this piece lies in its unique character and potential for personal interpretation. Should you decide to take this journey with us, you'll gain insight into a side of our offerings that might resonate differently than our previous selections.
